name: godot
description: A MCP server providing comprehensive Godot engine integration for project editing, debugging, and scene management.

examples.title: Launch Godot Editor
examples.description: Launch the Godot editor for a specific project.
examples.prompt: Launch the Godot editor for my project at /path/to/project

examples.description: Execute Godot projects in debug mode.

examples.title: Get Project Info
examples.description: Retrieve detailed information about the project structure.
examples.prompt: Get information about my Godot project structure

examples.title: Debug Assistance
examples.description: Help debug errors in Godot projects.

tools.description: Create a new Godot scene file

tools.name: add_node
tools.description: Add a node to an existing scene

projectPath.description: Path to the Godot project directory

tools.description: Load a sprite into a Sprite2D node

projectPath.description: Path to the Godot project directory

scenePath.description: Path to the scene file (relative to project)

tools.name: export_mesh_library
tools.description: Export a scene as a MeshLibrary resource

projectPath.description: Path to the Godot project directory

scenePath.description: Path to the scene file (.tscn) to export

outputPath.description: Path where the mesh library (.res) will be saved

meshItemNames.description: Optional: Names of specific mesh items to include (defaults to all)

tools.description: Save changes to a scene file

projectPath.description: Path to the Godot project directory

scenePath.description: Path to the scene file (relative to project)

tools.description: Get the UID for a specific file in a Godot project (for Godot 4.4+)
